Configuring Time Zones and NTP

Cisco UCS requires a domain-specific time zone setting and an NTP server to ensure the correct time to display in Cisco UCS Manager. If you do not configure both of these settings in a Cisco UCS domain, the time does not display correctly.

To configure Time Zones and NTP, perform the following:

 1. In the Admin Settings screen, select the Time Zone from the drop-down list.

 2. In the Configure NTP text field, enter the domain name or IP address and click Add.

 

Figure 3-4 Time Zones and NTP

Note You can configure a maximum of four NTP.
